text.title: The pantomime world of Italian political talk shows – video

main.head: The pantomime world of Italian political talk shows – video
main.p: This article is more than 10 years old

Italy's myriad political talkshows can look more like tame versions of WWE than programmes serving up serious and informative political discourse. In a country suffering from a deep economic slump, the shows are heavy on melodrama and lengthy, orchestrated fights, and light on fact-checking and hard-hitting interviews. Here are some highlights from recent years
